subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT - CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT - CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm
ET/PT

PARIS HILTON'S LAST DAY IN JAIL!
Has life behind bars really changed her? And can she really
turn from a sinner into a saint? Do not miss a Showbiz
Tonight
Special report on "The Perils Of Paris."
Only on TV's
most provocative entertainment news show.

PARIS'S FIRST TV INTERVIEW - ON CNN THIS
WEDNESDAY
Watch CNN's Larry King, this Wednesday June
20th, at 9pm ET for
Paris's FIRST post-jail TV interview.
Then at 11pm ET, Showbiz
Tonight will be the only
entertainment news show on TV that
will be live with the
VERY FIRST reactions to that blockbuster
broadcast.

ONE-ON-ONE WITH MICHAEL MOORE
Showbiz Tonight's
Brooke Anderson sits down with the director
of "Sicko." His
controversial movie, about the healthcare
industry, is one
of the most buzzed-about movies of the summer.
So you bet
we've got a lot to ask him - tonight.

SHOWBIZ
TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Paris Hilton after jail:
Do you think she'll be a changed
person?
VOTE AT
CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT

SEND US A VIDEO E-MAIL!

We want to hear your response to the Question of the
Day, or
whatever else is on your mind, on video. Responses
must be no
longer than 30 seconds. To do it, just head to
cnn.com/showbiztonight	 Then tune in to see your video
e-mail
on TV!

NIGHTS A WEEK ON CNN HEADLINE
